ygData.subject: What does it all mean?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Grounded slowly came out of stasis lock. Still weak he sat and thought. The hit from Deemos had awoken his purpose for coming to Earth in the first place.

Subject: What does it all mean?

X-Mailer: Unknown (No Version)
From: Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@...>

::Grounded::
Grounded slowly came out of stasis lock. Still weak he sat and thought. 
The hit from Deemos had awoken his purpose for coming to Earth in the 
first place.  His purpose was clear to him now, and he hoped that the 
Chivtrons would help him.  He remembered the story well.  Of how the 
matrix tried to make the superiour bot.  Organic and robotic all at 
once.  But the internal battles between the two completely different 
forms forced it to seperate.  Creating a mechanical bot bent on 
destroying all organic life on Cybertron.  OF course, this was hundred 
of millions of years ago.  The other half, the organic was trying to 
protect the organic things. Great Wars raged on between the two.
But what did this have to do with Grounded?
